remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個委派會報告相依性屬性變更的特定事件的處理常式簽章。This delegate is the handler signature for particular events that report dependency property changes. 使用這個處理常式的事件會公開為[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]不作為路由事件的事件。An event that uses this handler is exposed as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] event, not as a routed event. 這些事件通常會遵循命名模式`Is(` *PropertyName*`)Changed`，其中*PropertyName*是之屬性的變更。Typically these events follow the naming pattern `Is(`*PropertyName*`)Changed`, where *PropertyName* is the of the property that changed. 事件的引數用來查詢屬性的舊和新值中，特定的事件所報告。The arguments of the event are used to query the old and new value of the property, as reported by the particular event. 通常沒有 1:1 對應關係的屬性之間該變更並報告變更的特定事件。Typically there is a 1:1 correspondence between properties that change and a particular event that reports the change. 也很有可能，但不常見，有一個以上的屬性相同的事件報告變更。It is also possible, though uncommon, to have the same event report changes to more than one property. 在此情況下，應該檢查以判斷已變更的屬性。In this case, the should be checked to determine the property that changed. 事件資料類別比只是這個委派的更多使用量。The event data class has a wider usage than just this delegate. 也會用來通訊的資料實作，也就是內部的自訂功能的一部分的[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]屬性系統和一種可以覆寫，以提供類別專屬的虛擬方法，每當在物件上的任何相依性屬性變更通知。 is also used to communicate data for implementations, which are part of the customization features and internals of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system, and by the virtual method, which can be overridden to provide class-specific notifications whenever any dependency property on the object changes.
